name: How Do They Move
description: Hello! This is our first ever Game Jam submission as well as our first game! In this 2D platformer, you will help Quadrum escape the cave he fell down in! Use his companion Motus to alter your speed and jump abilities to solve the challenges that await! You can play the game either as a single player experience, or as co-op. We hope you enjoy what we were able to make!
